reviews.review: Brilliant game, runs great looks great and is great.
Great game. The story is a lot longer than the first game.

Bought this games during the Summer Sale. If you read my Portal 1 review, and thought I was salty, then GLaDOS takes the cake in the first half of Portal 2. GLaDOS is a salty savage who could roast probably anyone, but I think my friends do a better job. Roast aside, I really enjoyed Portal 2 equally if not better than Portal 1. I really wish Cave Johnson made more prerecorded messages!
An absolute masterpiece. Do not worry about playing the original before diving in to this beautiful game and its fantastic mechanics.

im only a little bit into this game (chapter 4-5ish) but its great! heaps of tricky puzzles to get you brain going, tons of funny voicelines from the characters and an immersive environment that really feels like you're trapped in a science facility missing most of its morals. a big part of it is the music, and how it holds hands with the look of the game with the melancholic drones mixed with the discarded remains of the facility. the apocalyptic storyline is also really interesting too and i cant wait to see it be expanded on as i progress through the game. there is one thing i dont like about the game and it's how the puzzles can be really tricky and time consuming when trying to figure out, but that's all i really have to comment on it in terms of flaws. its fantastic and im happy to be involved with it's fandom

Degno successore del suo predecessore (scusate il gioco di parole).

Portal 2 caratterizza ciò che nel primo capitolo non è stato fatto, con enigmi più dinamici e una vera e propria storyline, consigliato a chi vuole rilassarsi ma allo stesso tempo impegnarsi in un gioco.

Il comparto grafico è eccezionale (brava Valve) e il multiplayer (non presente nel primo capitolo) porta un che di rigiocabilità con un amico, consigliatissimo se ad entrambi piace il genere, troverete enigmi che saranno pane dei vostri denti.
worth the money, thats all i can say.
that was the best 11 hours i have ever spent on a game. I love the concept and the story line so much i wish there was a portal 3 XD. 10/10 would recommend.

So impressed with this game. it's very witty and fun. An intriguing, slowly unfolding story carries the player between the different creative spatial/physics puzzles. I"m enjoying this departure from the 1st person shooter genre.
robacki
Loved this game

To this day this is still one of my favourite games. If you haven't played it already then you must! I think that this is the perfect sequel to portal even if we never got a portal 3 :(. The voice acting of GLaDOS and Wheatley is just amazing coupled with the excellent storyline that has some great twists and turns. The game lasts around 10 hours which I think is fine as every bit of it I enjoyed. The game runs easily on a Potato ;) and on a good PC.

I had played this around 50 hours on my old account and loads on my old PS3 because of how much I liked this game. Some people may say that the puzzles are not as good in this one as the original however I think that they offer much wider variety than the first game.

Whats more is that you can play with friends too. Although it can be painful sometimes, it adds a whole different dynamic. However you will have to play with friends as this game is kinda old now so good luck getting a partner.

All in all, if you haven't played it yet: Do.
It's an all time classic now.

Improves on the first Portal in every possible way. The game is quite a bit longer with lots more chambers and tests to do. It is kinda praise worthy how much original new challenges were achieved with a bit of gel and playing around with gravity. The tests are never unfair hard, but always give you an aha moment went you complete them. The voiceacting is great with lots of funny skits and the story and total world has a lot more depth than I expected. There are some amazing community made levels available in the workshop, would recommend to anyone.

Отличная головоломка, на несколько вечеров. Словил флешбек, когда купил и перепрошёл эту игру. 
Также хочется выделить ко-оп. С ним связано несколько ачивок. В ко-опе как раз и содержится самая трудная ачивка: "Остаться в живых".
Эта игра не забыта комьюнити, и создаются отличные камеры от сообщества. Как и для одиночки, так и для ко-опа.
В общем. ОДНА ИЗ ЛУЧШИХ ИГР VALVE))0)

blue and yellow portals
playmel

Graphics and environmental design

The technical graphics of Portal 2 have improved a lot compared to the previous version, except for the slight addition of the Motion Blur effect. So you may not even notice it. On the other hand, the game's artistic graphics have been improved a lot by the creators. The APRETURE building environment is much more realistic than ever. It has been a long time since the events of Portal 1, which led to the imminent destruction of Glados, and during this time, the appearance of the APRETURE building has many changes. Many parts of it have been destroyed and the vegetation has penetrated into it, making the APRETURE building a tomb.

Gameplay

The main axis and core of the portal are based on its gameplay. Various puzzles with different features and conditions are included in the game. Some of them are simple and after a few minutes, you will find out how to solve them. Some are mediocre and you will need more time to solve them because you have to try several different methods that have come to your mind and you will probably taste the bitterness of death several times. Difficult puzzles also follow the law of intermediate puzzles. With the difference that in order to solve them, you have to carefully observe and examine all the corners and angles and blind spots of the location where you are present. This method can be very useful, especially in the deep and dilapidated areas of the APRETURE building


In portal 2, various items and phenomena can be seen. It is no longer a matter of energy bullets being deflected when hitting a wall and always endangering a player, and red lasers are used instead to do the same thing as energy bullets. And you have to give them a specific direction and direction, direct them to specific pages to provide the energy needed to open a door and be able to go to the next step.

Physics

Undoubtedly, the creators of an intellectual game such as Portal need something more than PORTAL GUN and other items to design unique puzzles. Having a "pure and precise physics" can be their last essential need in this way. Of course, obedience to the laws of physics is more evident in Portal 2 than in the previous version. Because the new game, in addition to more and more varied puzzles, also uses more features. there are countless other cases in which improper and careless use can lead to your failure or even death.

Music and sound

The creators of this game have not provided much music. Of course, the fact is that this title does not require a large number of music tracks. Because VALVE's main purpose in making this game is to persuade the player to use his thinking power. The player, of course, urgently needs to be calm and focused in order to achieve such a goal.

Conclusion

In the end, I must say that VALVE has definitely managed to correct the weaknesses of PORTAL 1 and make its strengths stronger and wider. Strong storytelling, challenging gameplay, puzzles that tell the story of their designers' ingenuity and taste, memorable characters and extremely professional voice acting with emotion and according to the role and performance of the characters, are among the factors that will bring honor and victory to PORTAL 2 and its creators.

It also comes packed with a great coop mode and lots of user generated levels. Если любите объёмные головоломки с сюжетом, то покупай.

Плюсы:
1. Бывают головоломки сложные, но обычно быстро решаются
2. Сюжет отличный, для такого жанра
3. По сравненную с первым Portal, графика тут улучшилась, а всяких механик стало больше
Минусы:
1. Кроме пару багов, минусов нет!
